entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,669Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 45

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: The New Hale Pack
entry.summary:
Author: Romantific

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,843Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Danielle Stilinski returns to Beacon Hills after graduating from Stanford University with honours, but she has a secret.She’s a very powerful witch.Dani is just settling into her new life and getting her business up and running when she finds out that one of her oldest friends, Laura Hale, is missing and people around town start dying violent deaths.She set’s out to find out what happened to her friend and why the towns people are dying along with her best friend, Derek Hale who had sworn to never return to Beacon Hills.Join Dani as she navigates the Hellmouth that is Beacon Hills and maybe finds love along the way.

entry.title: A Second Chance
entry.summary:
Author: Romantific

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,077Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 127

Summary: While working for the FBI Melinda Stilinski (Fem Stiles) gets the call that Derek is dead. In a fit of Grief she rushes home to Beacon Hills and finds herself at the Nemeton where she is offered a choice. Will that choice be enough to fix the future? Tune in to find out. (Aged up Stiles Stilinski. Melinda is 17 not 16. Also Aged down Derek, he’s going to be 20) time-travel.Chapter 1: Edited.

entry.title: Echoes of You (Traduccion de "Hasta Encontrarte")
entry.summary:
Author: ariadna19

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,242Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Beacon Hills was eerily silent.It wasn’t the kind of silence that comes before a storm, nor the hush of a forest at dusk. It was a void. As if something had been ripped out of the world… and no one could remember what.Scott noticed it first. Lydia felt it in her bones. Malia smelt it in the air. But no one could name it. No one could say what was missing.Except Derek. From the moment he crossed the town’s border, he knew something essential was gone. He couldn’t explain it, couldn’t name it, but he felt it like an open wound. And he wouldn’t stop until he discovered what—or who—had been erased from the world.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------💭What if the pack had called Derek during the Ghost Riders disaster in season 6A? What if he were the only one who could feel Stiles’ absence?

entry.title: To Forge a Pack
entry.summary:
Author: Arieanna

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 195,173Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 839

Summary: Derek Hale now has the beginnings of the Hale Pack, brought together with the help of Spark Stiles Stilinski. They took down Gerard after all his wrongdoings, and now Derek is looking at strengthening his pack.But things are changing faster than he can control. He knows, now, that he has a chance with Stiles having come out to him, but does that mean that the other boys wants him? Is it even a chance he should take?Besides, romance should be the last thing on his mind, since he found evidence that the Alpha Pack have started to make a move.Picks up directly where To Build A Pack ends.

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: The Way He Looks At Me
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,717Chapters: 6/8Kudos: 42

Summary: Derek Hale doesn’t know how to let people stay. Trauma taught him that love is dangerous, that opening the door only leads to more loss. First Hannah, then Laura. He’s still reeling, still holding himself together with frayed edges and silence.Stiles Stilinski doesn’t care. He shows up anyway, armed with too many questions, stubborn loyalty, and a steady presence Derek doesn’t know how to turn away. Somewhere between holding Derek up and keeping him grounded, Stiles falls in love.This is the story of Derek learning that healing is possible, that love can be safe, and that sometimes survival isn’t enough. Sometimes, you get to have more. And that people should be held accountable for their actions.

entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,798Chapters: 18/35Kudos: 421

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that.What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser.Also known as 50/50 slice of life/teen wolf drama with a hearty dose of the Hales being a close knit family

Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,748Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 75

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 184,463Chapters: 21/40Kudos: 599

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.
